response.explain: The previous action was successful and the fridge is now closed. The next step is to turn on the stove.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take out the prawn from the fridge
(3) Take out the butter from the fridge
(4) Close the fridge
(5) Turn on the stove
(6) Cook the prawn on the stove
(7) Turn off the stove
(8) Place the cooked prawn on the plate
(9) Place the butter on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 5: Turn on the stove
    stove = registry(env,"stove_igwqpj_0")
    toggle_on(robot, stove)
    donothing(env)
